examples.translation: No decency at all! When you were with him, you were playing the sister-in-law who stole his brother-in-law, it is written in everyone's book that this is shameful!” My sister was surprised for a moment, then said, "Mother, you have changed a lot." etymology: From Ottoman Turkish عار (ar), from Arabic عَار (ʕār).
